EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_Data Warehouse Age of Digital Transformation_Q117.Dow
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation white paper. We hope you found it informative and helpful as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this report, we thought you might also find these resources of interest:
- Webinar: Cloud-Native Data: What Data Questions to Ask When Building Cloud-Native Apps <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-15-cloud-native-data-what-data-questions-to-ask-when-building-cloud-native-apps-webinar]]> - eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]>
- White Paper: Pivotal Greenplum 5: The Next-Generation Data Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-greenplum-5-the-next-generation-data-platform]]> - Case Study: Aridhia - Creating a Platform to Power the Next Generation of Clinical and Translational Informatics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/aridhia]]> - Case Study: O’Reilly Media - Enabling Rapid Analysis of Huge Quantities of Data <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/oreilly]]>
- Community Video: Learn about the Greenplum Database <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sn971CLnTxI]]>
- Community Video: Machine Learning and Cyber Security with Greenplum and Apache MADlib <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V8JjkrlgY5c]]> - Learn more: Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum]]>
- Download: Greenplum Sandbox <[[http://greenplum.org/]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
